member.name: T:BCFviewer.BCFTreeNode
member.summary:
BCFTreeNode if a class derivated from TreeNode with additional properties :
- NodeFile : BCFfile reference if the TReeNodes refers to this type of element
- NodeTopic : Topic reference if the TReeNodes refers to this type of element
- NodeComment : Comment reference if the TReeNodes refers to this type of element
Only one of them shall be defined, the other shall be null

member.summary: Added property : BCFfile NodeFile

member.summary: Added property : Topic NodeTopic

member.summary: Added property : Comment NodeComment

members.member:
Viewpoint of a BCF file (referenced by a Topic or by a Comment) The Viewpoint defines the position of the camera and includes also a snapshot of the view as it was when the Topic or the Comment was created.
The Viewpoint includes the following properties :
Globally Unique Identifier
Index of the viewpoint
Visualization information file name
Snapshot file name
, , Camera location (in meters)
, , Camera direction
, , Camera Up vector
Field of view in degress
List of visible components
Content of the snapshot file (Bitmap)

member.summary: Globally Unique Identifier

member.summary: Index of the viewpoint

member.summary: Visualization information file name

member.summary: Snapshot file name

member.summary: Camera location, X component in meters

member.summary: Camera location, Y component in meters

member.summary: Camera location, Z component in meters

member.summary: Camera direction, X component

member.summary: Camera direction, Y component

member.summary: Camera direction, Z component

member.summary: Up vector, X component

member.summary: Up vector, Z component

member.summary: List of visible components

member.name: P:BCFclass.Viewpoint.Image
member.summary: Content (Bitmap) of the snapshot file

members.member:
Comment of a BCF file (referenced by a Topic) A Topic may contain multiple Comments, reflecting the discussion on its subject.
The Comment includes the following properties :
Creation date of the comment
Creation author of the comment
Text of the comment
Last modification date of the comment
Last modification author of the comment
GUID of the viewpoint associated to the comment (optional)
Viewpoint associated to the comment or null

member.name: P:BCFclass.Comment.Date
member.summary: Creation date of the comment

member.name: P:BCFclass.Comment.Author
member.summary: Creation author of the comment

member.name: P:BCFclass.Comment.Text
member.summary: Text of the comment

member.name: P:BCFclass.Comment.ModifiedDate
member.summary: Last modification date of the comment

member.name: P:BCFclass.Comment.ModifiedAuthor
member.summary: Last modification author of the comment

member.name: P:BCFclass.Comment.VPGuid
member.summary: GUID of the viewpoint associated to the comment (optional)

member.name: P:BCFclass.Comment.Viewpoint
member.summary: Viewpoint associated to the comment or null

members.member:
Topic of a BCF file They are used to store the properties, the list of Comments and the list of Viewpoints.
The Topic includes the following properties :
Full name of the *.bcfzip file, source of this Topic
Type of Topic
Status of the Topic
Title of the Topic
Priority of the Topic
Index of the Topic
Date of creation of the Topic
Author that created the Topic
Last date of modification of the Topic
Last Author that modified the Topic
Decription of the Topic
List of Comments associated to the Topic
List of Viewpoints associated to the Topic

member.summary: Title of the Topic

member.summary: Priority of the Topic

member.summary: Index of the Topic

member.summary: Date of creation of the Topic

member.name: P:BCFclass.Topic.CreationAuthor
member.summary: Author that created the Topic

member.summary: Last date of modification of the Topic

member.name: P:BCFclass.Topic.ModifiedAuthor
member.summary: Last Author that modified the Topic

member.summary: List of Comments associated to the Topic

members.member:
Content of one BCF files. Contains a list of Topics in the property BCF : BIM Collaboration Format
See : https://technical.buildingsmart.org/standards/bcf/
and : https://github.com/buildingSMART/BCF-XML/tree/master/Documentation
There are two constructors :
that creates an empty object
BCFfile(FileName) that creates an object and reads the content of a BCF file. The class provides one method :
to read or append a BCF file into the object. And one property :
that references all the Topics that have been read and appended with the above methods.
